results.p: : engaged to be married; a betrothed couple; clasped hands, signifying the bond between betrothed men and women.
betrothed Add to list Share · adjective. pledged to be married. synonyms: bespoken · attached, committed. associated in an exclusive sexual relationship · noun.

results.t: BETROTHED | definition in the Cambridge English Dictionary
results.p: 6 days ago — a person that someone has promised to marry, or has been promised to as a marriage partner. He sent a dozen roses to his betrothed.

results.t: BETROTHED Synonyms: 41 Similar and Opposite Words
results.p: Definition of betrothed as in engaged pledged in marriage a splendid party in honor of the betrothed couple.
1. engaged to be married; he was betrothed to her. noun 2. the person to whom one is engaged; fiancé or fiancée.
adjective engaged to be married: She is betrothed to that young lieutenant. noun the person to whom one is engaged: He introduced us to his betrothed.
A betrothal is a promise to remain faithful and constant by getting married. A betrothal is basically a fancy word for an engagement.
BETROTHED meaning: engaged to be married.
Best translation of the English word betrothed in Tagalog: pagpapakasal, katipan, katikya, may-katipan...

results.p: (formal or old-fashioned) betrothed (to somebody) having promised to marry somebody synonym engaged
